p: The regression equations, linearity ranges, correlation coefficients and LLOQs for the eight analytes were summarized in Supplementary Table S3. The correlation coefficients of linearity were higher than 0.998, demonstrating that all calibration curves were linear over the entire calibration range. The LLOQs ranged from 0.136 to 0.204 ng/mL, suggesting that the method was sensitive enough for all of the analytes in plasma.
